name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE, Appellants, v. RUFF EDGE FARMS, INC., Appellee
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth v. Ruff Edge Farms, Inc.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE, Appellants, v. RUFF EDGE FARMS, INC., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of April, 1986, the above-captioned appeal is DISMISSED AS MOOT.
HUTCHINSON, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Leroy S. Zimmerman, Atty. Gen., Kathleen F. McGrath, Deputy Atty. Gen., Allen G. Warshaw, Chief/Litigation Section, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Joseph Devanney, King of Prussia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
507 A.2d 388
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE, Appellants, v. RUFF EDGE FARMS, INC., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 16, 1986.
Leroy S. Zimmerman, Atty. Gen., Kathleen F. McGrath, Deputy Atty. Gen., Allen G. Warshaw, Chief/Litigation Section, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Joseph Devanney, King of Prussia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
